title: History of the Necronomicon
description: History of the Necronomicon is a short text written by H. P. Lovecraft. It describes the origins of the fictional book of the same the occult grimoire Necronomicon, a now-famous element of some of his stories. The short text purports to be non-fiction, adding to the appearance of 'pseudo-authenticity' which Lovecraft valued in building his Cthulhu Mythos oeuvre. Accordingly, it supposes the history of the Necronomicon as the inspiration for Robert W. Chambers' The King in Yellow, which concerns a book that overthrows the minds of those who read it.
author: H.P. Lovecraft
